resources.string: The wallpapers of the Fusion Festival homepage including an optional countdown.
You can drag the countdown around!
Show the countdown on the wallpaper?\nBy the way, you can drag it around!

Thank you for installing the Fusion Festival countdown. This app contains a live wallpaper and widgets for your homescreen.

You can now choose the wallpaper from your installed live wallpapers.

You can add a widget to your homescreen by longpressing free space of your homescreen. A menu will appear allowing you to install one of your widgets.

Have fun!
Ask your Friends, get a clique name and feel the anticipation
Goto www.fusion-festival.de and register for tickets and excitement raises…
No time for text - get beer and stuff and go to Turmbühne :o)
Show further notifications, so you dont miss important dates of the fusion
